Welcome to Megabouts’ documentation!¶

Accurate measurements of behavior are crucial to understanding animal physiology. Megabouts allows to quantify zebrafish larvae locomotion. This open-source Python toolbox handles locomotion in both freely swimming and head-restrained conditions and aims to promote standardized zebrafish locomotion analysis across neuroscience, pharmacology, and genetics.

The details for the underlying mathematics can be found in our paper on ArXiv:

Jouary, A et al., Megabouts: a toolbox for quantifying zebrafish locomotion, ArXiv e-prints number, 2024

You can find the software on github.

Installation

PyPI install, presuming you have pytorch and all its requirements installed:

pip install megabouts
